commit.message:
Auto merge of #4421 - lzutao:unsep_literal, r=flip1995

Cleaner code for unsep literals

Continuing discussion in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/pull/4401#issuecomment-522498754
changelog: none
r? @flip1995
